page.title: 15Youth Clubs, Irthlingborough
page.content: Irthlingborough has a Beaver pack, 2 Brownie packs, 1 Guide company, 1 Cub pack and 1 Scout troop. They are all flourishing and meet regularly once a week. Brownies usually go camping once a year and they go to Oundle. Guides usually go on two or three camping week-ends and a one week camp and often go to Overstone. Cubs go on camp week-ends two or three times a year, they go to Bromham. Scouts go as many times as they wish and they often go to Wadenhoe. Wednesday Club is held at the Baptist Church Hall. It is for children up to 18 years. It is mostly concerned with sporting activities such as table tennis, snooker, darts and ball games. There is a piano and also cooking facilities. At Christmas, there is a Christmas party.
